02eb8892-330a-4cdd-974c-49dd74875bc8.Text:
Can only be used on enemies with the unfinished business effect. This effect is applied to enemies which were attacked by the Master Tactician or the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}'s allies and have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining.
The Master Tactician immediately attacks the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or strike. This attack does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} limit, dealing an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} x 3 damage.

1f3eef73-6e06-48fa-8db0-854233642b0f.Text: The Master Tactician suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, gains Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} stacks of tactical advantage, and resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Linchpin, Inspire, and Strongpoint. Until the end of the Master Tactician's turn, these abilities can only target the Master Tactician themselves.
